config.configDesc: (You must press 'Save & Restart' for some changes to take effect)
config.extremeGamesDesc: Show games with sexual, violent or other content unsuitable for children.
config.enableEditingDesc: Enable editing of games, additional applications and playlists. Also shows the 'Curate' tab.
config.flashpointPathDesc: Path to the Flashpoint folder (can be relative)
config.redirectorDesc: Which software to use for redirecting the game traffic to the local web server. Neither is used on Linux.
config.useWineDesc: Launch applications with Wine. Only enable this if Wine is installed.
config.useCustomTitleBarDesc: Use a custom title bar at the top of this window.
config.themeDesc: File path of the theme to use (relative to the themes folder).
config.showDeveloperTabDesc: Show the 'Developer' tab. This is most likely only useful for developers and curators.

home.hallOfFameInfo: Only want the best of the best? Check out the {0}!
